definitions.text: a large, flat, thin case for carrying loose papers or drawings or maps; usually leather
examples: he remembered her because she was carrying a large portfolio

definitions.text: a set of pieces of creative work collected to be shown to potential customers or employers
examples: the artist had put together a portfolio of his work
every actor has a portfolio of photographs

definitions.text: a list of the financial assets held by an individual or a bank or other financial institution
examples: they were disappointed by the poor returns on their stock portfolio

definitions.text: the role of the head of a government department
examples: he holds the portfolio for foreign affairs
